analysis.description:
PreIco.withdrawEtherTo (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#480-500) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- _escrow.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#482-488)

Reentrancy in PreIco.returnFundsFor (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#431-453):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(_user,userTokenValue) (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#446-452)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _user.send(ethBalances[_user]) (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#433-435)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- userTokensValues (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#450-452)

PreIco.buyWithTokensBy (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#355-375) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- assert(bool)(token.balanceOf(address(this)) - prevBalance == tokensToSend)

PreIco.returnFundsFor has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(_user,userTokenValue) (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#446-452)

PreIco.withdrawEtherTo has external calls inside a loop:
	- tokenBalance = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#493)

PreIco.withdrawEtherTo has external calls inside a loop:
	- token.transfer(_escrow,tokenBalance) (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#494-499)

Reentrancy in PreIco.buyWithTokensBy (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#355-375):
	External calls:
	- tokensToSend = token.allowance(_user,address(this)) (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#360-361)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#363-366)
	- tokensSupplied (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#363)

Reentrancy in PreIco.buyWithTokensBy (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#355-375):
	External calls:
	- tokensToSend = token.allowance(_user,address(this)) (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#360-361)
	- prevBalance = token.balanceOf(address(this)) (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#366-367)
	- assert(bool)(token.transferFrom(_user,address(this),tokensToSend)) (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#367-370)
	- assert(bool)(token.balanceOf(address(this)) - prevBalance == tokensToSend) (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#370-371)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isUserInList (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#374)
	- userTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#373-374)
	- userTokensValues (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#371-373)
	- usersList (/unique_chucks/20/0xc654ec1fc5a1c76a19bf169ef2765cef23cdd236.sol#374)
